post.preview: Speed up the computation of SimRank scores on heterogeneous information networks
post.title: Fast Computation of SimRank Enhanced by Semantics on HIN
post.content:
- 2021.12-2022.01

- Final Project for Graph Data Mining

- Abstract: The project focuses on the technique of computing SimRank scores on heterogeneous information networks and propose a novel computation framework for HINs. The proposed linear equation has good features to enable Conjugate Gradient Iterative method and its variants to speed up the computation. The project implements the new computation algorithm and experimental results on different datasets solidates its efficiency.
